title: 18 Comfortable Office Chairs That Are Perfect for Working from Home
description: These stylish office chairs will help you work smarter — and cozier. READ MORE...
author: Marlen Komar
excerpt: To help you narrow down your search for the perfect office chair, here are some of the internet’s best office chairs that highly rated and actually stylish.
text: DecoratingBy RoomOfficesShoppingWe independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.If you’re used to spending most of your day behind a desk, you want need seating that you enjoy as much as you do your desk accessories and vision board. While we may be deep into the age of working from home, you still might not have a comfortable office chair for your workspace. And considering that your workspace is an integral part of your home, you most definitely want furniture that isn’t an eyesore!Our Top PicksThe Most Comfortable Office ChairsNot to worry: You can find desk chairs out there that offer both superior form and function without setting you back a small fortune. To help you narrow down your search, we took on the challenge of uncovering some of the internet’s best office chairs. We prioritized chairs that were comfortable to sit in for long stretches, won’t clash with your favorite desk, and that come in a range of fabric and color options. Below, check out 18 picks that are highly rated and chic enough to keep you working from home in comfort and style.Do you have a stylishly comfortable office chair you swear by? We want to hear all about it. Tell us about your favorite finds in the comments below!1 / 18Best OverallAmazon$248.95was $299.99When it comes to the ultimate all-in-one office chair, it's hard to beat the Efomao chair. This internet darling has it all: lumbar support, plush, yet supportive cushioning, wheels, tons of color options. But the thing that sets it apart is its pull-out footest that makes reclining back and sitting cross-legged as simple a quick adjustment. What's not to love? 2 / 18Best Budget Office ChairAmazon$64.99was $69.99Ergonomic chairs aren't typically associated with "style," but the Smug is close enough. It looks less bulky than traditional ergonomic office chairs, plus it comes in a clean gray and white color combination that gives it a more contemporary look. At under $70 it's also a steal compared to similar models. 3 / 18Best Ergonomic Office ChairBranch Furniture$329.00The Branch Ergonomic Office Chair may not look super fancy but the padded mesh design is beloved by thousands of shoppers — and our very own deputy commerce editor Alicia. The reason? It’s ergonomically designed, making it an incredibly comfortable pick for hours on end (it was designed to be sat in for a full eight-hour day!) The seat, which is made out of high-density foam, is on the firmer side and provides a lot of support to the hips. The chair also provides eight points of adjustment, so you can customize it to your fit preferences. And while the chair is supportive on its own, there’s also the option to add a headrest with neck support, which makes it even more comfortable4 / 18Best Executive Office ChairWayfair$175.99was $204.99If you want a more stylish seat and have always loved the look of a high-end leather office chair, this Eames-inspired pick desk chair lets you take advantage of in-the-office productivity from your home. It offers ergonomic back and leg support and can tilt back slightly when you need to stretch. Plus, it's available in four colors so you can find one that fits your style.5 / 18Best Small Space Office ChairAmazon$125.99was $139.99Those who work in small quarters know what a challenge it can be to find an office chair that won’t overwhelm your workspace. Therefore, selecting the best-looking seat regardless of style isn’t really an option.. Fortunately, we found a great option in the form of the Zesthouse Modern Home Office Chair. A favorite of commerce writer Haley, it's made of a combination of faux leather, rattan, and chrome and features a compact size that lets you get the best of both worlds. 6 / 18Best Cross-Legged Office ChairAmazon$55.99was $94.99If you love sitting cross-legged, you're going to love the Pukami Armless Office Chair. A Tik-Tok favorite, this chair features an extra wide seat that makes sitting cross-legged not only possible but comfortable. With a chic modern styling and multiple color options, it's also a pick that will blend perfectly into most spaces. 7 / 18Most Stylish Office ChairWest Elm$399.00For those who don’t like bulky office chairs with clunky wheels, the upholstered West Elm Mid-Century Swivel Office Chair is pretty much perfect. It has stylish slanted legs, a sloping back, and a firmly cushioned seat to provide much-needed back support for those long afternoons filled with emails and calls (and sneaky Instagram breaks). It's also crafted of commercial-grade fabric, so you know it's going to hold up well to wear and tear.8 / 18Best Reclining Office ChairAmazon$185.99was $229.99Another Tik-Tok find, this office chair comes with a footrest making it perfect for anyone looking to keep comfortable as they work. It also features a 135-degree recline and ergonomic back support for optimal comfort whether you sit upright, cross-legged, or kicked back. 9 / 18Best Office Chair for Back PainTempur-Pedic$299.20was $352.00If you’ve been wishing for an office chair that feels as comfortable as lying in bed, the TEMPUR-Lumbar Support Office Chair is for you. TEMPUR-PEDIC is known for making comfy mattresses, mattress toppers, and pillows, so it’s no surprise that their office chair is also a back-saver. From first glance, you likely wouldn’t expect the chair to be all that supportive — it has a thick seat and thin mesh back. In reality, it’s expertly designed to support the spine and hips, making for a luxe sitting sitch.10 / 18Best Serta Office ChairWayfair$241.16You'll feel like you’re working from your sofa when you pull the Serta Ashland Task Chair up to your desk. It has memory foam in the seat and arms and comes in a whopping 9 different shades — plus, the fabric cover can be cleaned with warm water and soap, a nice bonus if you're prone to dining al desko. The only cons are height related: People over six feet tall find the back too low, and people shorter than five feet tall find that their legs can’t comfortably reach the floor. 11 / 18Best Mesh Office ChairAmazon$263.99was $399.99Available in three colors, this adjustable, ergonomic desk chair is made from breathable mesh that keeps you cool and comfortable. The chair is infinitely configurable, allowing you to sit fully upright or completely recline, and you can adjust the lumbar support for maximum support for the ultimate mesh pick. 12 / 18Lulu and Georgia$1249.00This stunning office chair from Lulu and Georgia is classic, elegant, and functional, making it the perfect alternative to your standard run-of-the-mill office chair. The high-quality tan leather and curved wooden arms allow it to blend effortlessly into a wide range of home decor styles and color palettes.13 / 18Best Swivel ChairWest Elm$399.00Wooden armrests are a welcome vintage touch, but we like this chair because it backs up its style with superb functionality. A supportive backrest, swivel seat, rolling wheels, and easily adjustable height let you find your comfy spot and feel energized even after hours of sitting. You also have your choice of fabric coverings, including velvet, leather, and vegan leather, for additional cost.14 / 18Best Task ChairWayfair$299.99With its nailhead trim and wooden base, the handsome Soule Task Chair will class up your home office. It’s on casters, which means it's super convenient for moving around, and it comes in a nice range of colors.15 / 18Best Plush Office ChairWayfair$289.99Simple, stylish, and sleek, this executive chair from Corrigan Studio is a downright masterpiece. It was thoughtfully designed with an adjustable seat angle, padded arms, and lumbar support for dependable comfort throughout the workday. It also comes in four stunning neutral colors: Black, Cream, Brownish Gray, Camel, and Coffee. 16 / 18Best Office Chair for KidsWayfair$69.99was $80.89Leave it to Wayfair to have an office chair option that's as cute and cheap as the Rubin Mesh Office Chair. This guy would be a great addition in a kid's room or playroom. And if purple isn't your color, the Avri is also available in mustard orange and green.17 / 18Best Acrylic Office ChairPB Teen$479.00This trendy "ghost-style" chair would be great for a dorm room or small apartment thanks to its compact, clear, gold-accented seat and adjustable height lever. Just add a sheepskin throw, and you've got a comfy, discreet spot to get some work done. 18 / 18Best Viral Office ChairAmazon$329.00For people who llike to sit cross-legged or tend to fidget, this meditation chair is a great option that allows you to sit comfortably in any number of positions. It comes with a 360-degree foot stool and is padded with thick, high-density foam that protects your hips, feet, knees, and ankles as you switch positions.

  • By Room

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

If you’re used to spending most of your day behind a desk, you want need seating that you enjoy as much as you do your desk accessories and vision board. While we may be deep into the age of working from home, you still might not have a comfortable office chair for your workspace. And considering that your workspace is an integral part of your home, you most definitely want furniture that isn’t an eyesore!

Our Top Picks

The Most Comfortable Office Chairs

Not to worry: You can find desk chairs out there that offer both superior form and function without setting you back a small fortune. To help you narrow down your search, we took on the challenge of uncovering some of the internet’s best office chairs. We prioritized chairs that were comfortable to sit in for long stretches, won’t clash with your favorite desk, and that come in a range of fabric and color options. Below, check out 18 picks that are highly rated and chic enough to keep you working from home in comfort and style.

Do you have a stylishly comfortable office chair you swear by? We want to hear all about it. Tell us about your favorite finds in the comments below!

1 / 18

Best Overall

Amazon

$248.95

was $299.99

When it comes to the ultimate all-in-one office chair, it's hard to beat the Efomao chair. This internet darling has it all: lumbar support, plush, yet supportive cushioning, wheels, tons of color options. But the thing that sets it apart is its pull-out footest that makes reclining back and sitting cross-legged as simple a quick adjustment. What's not to love?

2 / 18

Best Budget Office Chair

Amazon

$64.99

was $69.99

Ergonomic chairs aren't typically associated with "style," but the Smug is close enough. It looks less bulky than traditional ergonomic office chairs, plus it comes in a clean gray and white color combination that gives it a more contemporary look. At under $70 it's also a steal compared to similar models.

3 / 18

Best Ergonomic Office Chair

Branch Furniture

$329.00

The Branch Ergonomic Office Chair may not look super fancy but the padded mesh design is beloved by thousands of shoppers — and our very own deputy commerce editor Alicia. The reason? It’s ergonomically designed, making it an incredibly comfortable pick for hours on end (it was designed to be sat in for a full eight-hour day!) The seat, which is made out of high-density foam, is on the firmer side and provides a lot of support to the hips. The chair also provides eight points of adjustment, so you can customize it to your fit preferences. And while the chair is supportive on its own, there’s also the option to add a headrest with neck support, which makes it even more comfortable

4 / 18

Best Executive Office Chair

Wayfair

$175.99

was $204.99

If you want a more stylish seat and have always loved the look of a high-end leather office chair, this Eames-inspired pick desk chair lets you take advantage of in-the-office productivity from your home. It offers ergonomic back and leg support and can tilt back slightly when you need to stretch. Plus, it's available in four colors so you can find one that fits your style.

5 / 18

Best Small Space Office Chair

Amazon

$125.99

was $139.99

Those who work in small quarters know what a challenge it can be to find an office chair that won’t overwhelm your workspace. Therefore, selecting the best-looking seat regardless of style isn’t really an option.. Fortunately, we found a great option in the form of the Zesthouse Modern Home Office Chair. A favorite of commerce writer Haley, it's made of a combination of faux leather, rattan, and chrome and features a compact size that lets you get the best of both worlds.

6 / 18

Best Cross-Legged Office Chair

Amazon

$55.99

was $94.99

If you love sitting cross-legged, you're going to love the Pukami Armless Office Chair. A Tik-Tok favorite, this chair features an extra wide seat that makes sitting cross-legged not only possible but comfortable. With a chic modern styling and multiple color options, it's also a pick that will blend perfectly into most spaces.

7 / 18

Most Stylish Office Chair

West Elm

$399.00

For those who don’t like bulky office chairs with clunky wheels, the upholstered West Elm Mid-Century Swivel Office Chair is pretty much perfect. It has stylish slanted legs, a sloping back, and a firmly cushioned seat to provide much-needed back support for those long afternoons filled with emails and calls (and sneaky Instagram breaks). It's also crafted of commercial-grade fabric, so you know it's going to hold up well to wear and tear.

8 / 18

Best Reclining Office Chair

Amazon

$185.99

was $229.99

Another Tik-Tok find, this office chair comes with a footrest making it perfect for anyone looking to keep comfortable as they work. It also features a 135-degree recline and ergonomic back support for optimal comfort whether you sit upright, cross-legged, or kicked back.

9 / 18

Best Office Chair for Back Pain

Tempur-Pedic

$299.20

was $352.00

If you’ve been wishing for an office chair that feels as comfortable as lying in bed, the TEMPUR-Lumbar Support Office Chair is for you. TEMPUR-PEDIC is known for making comfy mattresses, mattress toppers, and pillows, so it’s no surprise that their office chair is also a back-saver. From first glance, you likely wouldn’t expect the chair to be all that supportive — it has a thick seat and thin mesh back. In reality, it’s expertly designed to support the spine and hips, making for a luxe sitting sitch.

10 / 18

Best Serta Office Chair

Wayfair

$241.16

You'll feel like you’re working from your sofa when you pull the Serta Ashland Task Chair up to your desk. It has memory foam in the seat and arms and comes in a whopping 9 different shades — plus, the fabric cover can be cleaned with warm water and soap, a nice bonus if you're prone to dining al desko. The only cons are height related: People over six feet tall find the back too low, and people shorter than five feet tall find that their legs can’t comfortably reach the floor. 

11 / 18

Best Mesh Office Chair

Amazon

$263.99

was $399.99

Available in three colors, this adjustable, ergonomic desk chair is made from breathable mesh that keeps you cool and comfortable. The chair is infinitely configurable, allowing you to sit fully upright or completely recline, and you can adjust the lumbar support for maximum support for the ultimate mesh pick.

12 / 18

Lulu and Georgia

$1249.00

This stunning office chair from Lulu and Georgia is classic, elegant, and functional, making it the perfect alternative to your standard run-of-the-mill office chair. The high-quality tan leather and curved wooden arms allow it to blend effortlessly into a wide range of home decor styles and color palettes.

13 / 18

Best Swivel Chair

West Elm

$399.00

Wooden armrests are a welcome vintage touch, but we like this chair because it backs up its style with superb functionality. A supportive backrest, swivel seat, rolling wheels, and easily adjustable height let you find your comfy spot and feel energized even after hours of sitting. You also have your choice of fabric coverings, including velvet, leather, and vegan leather, for additional cost.

14 / 18

Best Task Chair

Wayfair

$299.99

With its nailhead trim and wooden base, the handsome Soule Task Chair will class up your home office. It’s on casters, which means it's super convenient for moving around, and it comes in a nice range of colors.

15 / 18

Best Plush Office Chair

Wayfair

$289.99

Simple, stylish, and sleek, this executive chair from Corrigan Studio is a downright masterpiece. It was thoughtfully designed with an adjustable seat angle, padded arms, and lumbar support for dependable comfort throughout the workday. It also comes in four stunning neutral colors: Black, Cream, Brownish Gray, Camel, and Coffee.

16 / 18

Best Office Chair for Kids

Wayfair

$69.99

was $80.89

Leave it to Wayfair to have an office chair option that's as cute and cheap as the Rubin Mesh Office Chair. This guy would be a great addition in a kid's room or playroom. And if purple isn't your color, the Avri is also available in mustard orange and green.

17 / 18

Best Acrylic Office Chair

PB Teen

$479.00

This trendy "ghost-style" chair would be great for a dorm room or small apartment thanks to its compact, clear, gold-accented seat and adjustable height lever. Just add a sheepskin throw, and you've got a comfy, discreet spot to get some work done.

18 / 18

Best Viral Office Chair

Amazon

$329.00

For people who llike to sit cross-legged or tend to fidget, this meditation chair is a great option that allows you to sit comfortably in any number of positions. It comes with a 360-degree foot stool and is padded with thick, high-density foam that protects your hips, feet, knees, and ankles as you switch positions.
